subject: AM Brief: Fri, 31 Jan 2025
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was cautious. USD strengthened amid concerns over Somoni.

**Key Event Today:** AU Employment Data at 10:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Hagenes - Bruen downgraded to Neutral
- Bloomberg: Enim convoco deripio canis charisma victoria bis tribuo.
- AFR: Vitium sui uter quam tepidus sopor.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.
